# Need to have at least 3 variables 
#   random (generated by computer between 1-10) #
#   guess where the player guesses number #
#   attempt (track the user attempts up to 3) #

START
    Set the Random number to value between 1 and 10
    Set the attempt to 3

While attempt > 0 run the following
    PRINT "Guess the number (between 1 and 10) "
    Input from user = guess

        If guess = random 
            PRINT "Congrats you guessed the correct number!"
            End If
        Else
            PRINT "Incorrect guess.  Try again."
            attempt = attempt - 1
    
    If attempt = 0
        PRINT "Sorry, you have used all your attempts.  The correct number was"  + random

END
